channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
Ok well im following [url=http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?42313-PI-making-player-owned-shops]this guide for player owned shops[/url] and i followed everything he did exactly how he did it. and i keep getting these errors. any help ?
[code] characterfile.write("character-posy = ", 0, 17); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:285: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.absY), 0, Integer .toString(p.absY).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:286: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:287: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("character-rights = ", 0, 19); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:288: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerRights), 0, Integer.toString(p.playerRights).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:289: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:290: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("shopcollect = ", 0, 14); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:291: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerCollect), 0 , Integer.toString(p.playerCollect).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:292: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:293: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("crystal-bow-shots = ", 0, 20); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:294: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.crystalBowArrowCo unt), 0, Integer.toString(p.crystalBowArrowCount).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:295: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:296: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("skull-timer = ", 0, 14); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:297: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.skullTimer), 0, I nteger.toString(p.skullTimer).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:298: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:299: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("EP = ", 0, 5); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:300: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.earningPotential) , 0, Integer.toString(p.earningPotential).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:301: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:302: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("Agrith = ", 0, 9); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:303: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(p.Agrith), 0, Boole an.toString(p.Agrith).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:304: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:305: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("Flambeed = ", 0, 11); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:306: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(p.Flambeed), 0, Boo lean.toString(p.Flambeed).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:307: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:308: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("Karamel = ", 0, 10); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:309: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(p.Karamel), 0, Bool ean.toString(p.Karamel).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:310: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:311: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("Dessourt = ", 0, 11); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:312: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(p.Dessourt), 0, Boo lean.toString(p.Dessourt).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:313: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:314: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("culin = ", 0, 8); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:315: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(p.Culin), 0, Boolea n.toString(p.Culin).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:316: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:317: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("wave = ", 0, 7); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:318: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.waveId), 0, Integ er.toString(p.waveId).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:319: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:320: class, interface, or enum expected

characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:323: class, interface, or enum expected

characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerPrayerBook) , 0, Integer.toString(p.playerPrayerBook).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:325: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:326: class, interface, or enum expected
for (int b = 0; b < p.barrowsNpcs.length; b++) { ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:326: class, interface, or enum expected
for (int b = 0; b < p.barrowsNpcs.length; b++) { ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:326: class, interface, or enum expected
for (int b = 0; b < p.barrowsNpcs.length; b++) { ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:328: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(b), 0, Inte ger.toString(b).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:329: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(" ", 0, 1); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:330: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(p.barrowsNpcs[b][1] <= 1 ? I nteger.toString(0) : Integer.toString(p.barrowsNpcs[b][1]), 0, Integer.toString( p.barrowsNpcs[b][1]).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:331: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:332: class, interface, or enum expected
} ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:334: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Double.toString(p.specAmount), 0, Do uble.toString(p.specAmount).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:335: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:336: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("selected-coffin = ", 0, 18); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:337: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.randomCoffin), 0, Integer.toString(p.randomCoffin).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:338: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:339: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("barrows-killcount = ", 0, 20); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:340: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.barrowsKillCount) , 0, Integer.toString(p.barrowsKillCount).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:341: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:342: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("teleblock-length = ", 0, 19); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:343: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(tbTime), 0, Integer .toString(tbTime).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:344: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:345: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("pc-points = ", 0, 12); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:346: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.pcPoints), 0, Int eger.toString(p.pcPoints).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:347: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:348: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("isDonator = ", 0, 12); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:349: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.isDonator), 0, In teger.toString(p.isDonator).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:350: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.newLine(); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:351: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write("slayerTask = ", 0, 13); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:352: class, interface, or enum expected
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.slayerTask), 0, I nteger.toString(p.slayerTask).length()); ^ 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Please help? :\

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Josh9 -Josh
item.description:
